files.name: commands.py
files.description: CLI interface for an educational content aggregator, managing user operations, content updates, and automated scheduling through database and external service integrations.

files.name: config.py
files.description: Configuration management module using Pydantic and dotenv to centralize environment variables for API keys, database connections, and content sources.

files.name: __init__.py
files.description: Utility module with minimal significant logic.

files.name: database.py
files.description: SQLAlchemy ORM models for a personalized learning platform, defining user profiles, content metadata, progress tracking, and preference management.

files.name: interactive.py
files.description: Interactive CLI for content aggregation and recommendation, integrating with database models for user, content, and interests management.

files.name: __init__.py
files.description: Utility module with minimal significant logic.

files.name: aggregator.py
files.description: Content aggregation service for user-specific feeds, integrating with user, content, and tagging models to update personalized content streams.

files.name: email_sender.py
files.description: Automated email dispatch system for personalized user digests and notifications, integrating SMTP with environment-based configuration and structured logging.

files.name: exporter.py
files.description: Progress data export utility for JSON, Markdown, and DOCX generation, integrating with a database session for user and learning progress retrieval.

files.name: recommender.py
files.description: Content-based recommendation engine leveraging user history and item metadata, integrated with core user and content management models.

files.name: __init__.py
files.description: Utility module with minimal significant logic.

files.name: base.py
files.description: Abstract base class defining the interface and common logic for content source implementations, enabling standardized content ingestion across the system.

files.name: coursera.py
files.description: Data ingestion stub for Coursera API integration, requiring authentication and returning placeholder data for course retrieval.

files.name: habr.py
files.description: Habr RSS feed ingestion pipeline using BeautifulSoup for HTML parsing and requests for content retrieval, designed for integration into a data processing or content aggregation system.

files.name: youtube.py
files.description: YouTube video ingestion pipeline via the YouTube Data API, with database integration for content and tag storage.

files.name: main.py
files.description: Application entry point for CLI-based startup, database initialization, and user configuration management via Click.
